note:
After the UK political, economic and societal turmoil of 14 years of Tory Government incompetence, sleaze and corruption, I am hopeful that the new Labour Government has the determination - and are given the time and support - to begin to rebuild.

Here looking for engagement that challenges my preconceptions, informs my opinions, makes me smile - and blows my tiny mind...

Recently able to take early retirement and move from Scotland to the Turkish North of the Mediterranean island of Cyprus.
